ticket.title: config.filter_parameters doesn't effect in-browser request dump
ticket.original-body:
rails-3.0.0.beta2
I've got `config.filter_parameters << :password` in config/application.rb. It filters the password in the logs, as expected, however, it quite unexpectedly shows all of my colleagues my password in the browser:
@@@ Request
Parameters:
{"commit"=>"Sign in", "authenticity_token"=>"...............", "user"=>{"remember_me"=>"0", "username"=>"my_username", "password"=>"my_password"}} @@@

ticket.original-body-html:
rails-3.0.0.beta2

I've got config.filter_parameters << :password in config/application.rb. It filters the password in the logs, as expected, however, it quite unexpectedly shows all of my colleagues my password in the browser:

Request

Parameters:

{"commit"=>"Sign in",
 "authenticity_token"=>"...............",
 "user"=>{"remember_me"=>"0",
 "username"=>"my_username",
 "password"=>"my_password"}}

version.body: (from [eb063538bd58c915c953e4b8a295d3a1b1a321d5]) Use config.filter_parameters on in-browser request dump. [#4335 state:resolved] http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/eb063538bd58c915c953e4b8a295d3a1b1a321d5
